body.p: I shall be happy to accept the Dedication you are so obliging as to offer me. Your delicacy in not putting your name to the sensible and timely little work, I quite appreciate. And I fully concur in its expediency.Presumably priv. printed; no book by Manson traced.

closer.salute: With thanks, I remain | Faithfully Yours
